title: Ninja Scroll 10th Anniversary Special Edition (Disk 1) - AKA Jub
description:
>>>> Use VLC player: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ <<<<


Movie Details:
--------------
Genre: Anime
Original Name (JAP): Jubei Ninpuchu
English Name: Ninja Scroll
Year: 1993
Duration: 1hr 31min 18sec

Production Details:
-------------------
Directors: Yoshiaki Kawajiri
Producers: Makoto Hasegawa, Masamichi Fujiwara, Yutaka Takahashi
Writers: Yoshiaki Kawajiri

Plot:
-----
A ninja-for-hire is forced into fighting an old nemesis who is bent on overthrowing the Japanese government. His nemesis is also the leader of a group of demons each with superhuman powers

AV Properties:
-----------------
Aspect Ratio: 3/4
Codec: XVID
Resolution: 800x608
Framerate: 25.0
Audio: 2 Channel, 48KHz, 180kb/s
Subtitles: English, Swedish

Notes:
------
1. This is the movie portion of the 10th Anniversary Special Edition.
2. The special features will follow in a separate torrent.
3. Translations are pretty weak/sloppy
